reviewText: Excellent film. Am going to use it in the Earth Care Programs we are doing here in Morro Bay, CA. This film tells the story of climate change and how it is being handled by different peoples throughout the world. it is not a  depressing film, but one with hope.
"Climate of Change" Not purchased by me.
A charming film.  Not as hard hitting as some of the others like The Cove or If a Tree Falls.
